publications

published/in press

  • Georgiades C, Geschwind J-F, Neil H, Hines-Peralta A, Liapi E, Hong K, Wu Z, Kamel I, Frangakis CE(2012). Lack of response after initial chemoembolization for hepatocellular carcinoma: Does it predict failure of subsequent treatment? Radiology 265:115-123.[pdf]
